languages.text: {n}Когда девушка вновь смотрит на вас, ее глаза совершенно стеклянны, словно разум Кибеллы обращен внутрь. Она похожа на пустую оболочку, управляемую малой толикой разума, пока мысли ее спрятаны куда-то в глубину. Рука, лежащая на столе, едва шевелится — палец, чуть дергаясь, двигается по смутно знакомому узору...{/n}

{n}When she looks at you again, her eyes are glassy, suggesting that all her thoughts are now turned inward. She resembles an empty shell, governed by a mere fraction of her mind, while the rest of it eludes your sight. You notice that her hand that is lying on the table is not completely still: her finger, with subtle twitches, is tracing a familiar pattern...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда девушка вновь смотрит на вас, ее глаза совершенно стеклянны, словно разум Кибеллы обращен внутрь. Она похожа на пустую оболочку, управляемую малой толикой разума, пока мысли ее спрятаны куда-то в глубину. Рука, лежащая на столе, едва шевелится — палец, чуть дергаясь, двигается по смутно знакомому узору...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When she looks at you again, her eyes are glassy, as if her thoughts are turned inward. She resembles an empty shell governed by a fraction of her mind while the rest of it eludes your sight. You notice that her hand lying on the table is not completely still — her finger, twitching subtly, is tracing a familiar pattern...{/n}

You notice that her hand lying on the table is not completely still — her finger, twitching subtly, is tracing a familiar pattern...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als sie dich wieder ansieht, sind ihre Augen glasig. Alle ihre Gedanken sind nun wohl offenbar nach innen gerichtet. Sie ähnelt einer leeren Hülle, gesteuert von einem bloßen Bruchteil ihres Verstands, während der Rest für dich nicht sichtbar ist. Du bemerkst, dass ihre auf dem Tisch liegende Hand nicht vollkommen still ist: Mit kaum wahrnehmbaren, zuckenden Bewegungen, zeichnet ihr Finger ein vertrautes Muster ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When she looks at you again, her eyes are glassy, suggesting that all her thoughts are now turned inward. She resembles an empty shell, governed by a mere fraction of her mind, while the rest of it eludes your sight. You notice that her hand that is lying on the table is not completely still: her finger, with subtle twitches, is tracing a familiar pattern...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als sie dich wieder ansieht, sind ihre Augen glasig. Alle ihre Gedanken sind nun wohl offenbar nach innen gerichtet. Sie ähnelt einer leeren Hülle, gesteuert von einem bloßen Bruchteil ihres Verstands, während der Rest für dich nicht sichtbar ist. Du bemerkst, dass ihre auf dem Tisch liegende Hand nicht vollkommen still ist: Mit kaum wahrnehmbaren, zuckenden Bewegungen, zeichnet ihr Finger ein vertrautes Muster ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando vuelve a mirarte, sus ojos están vidriosos, lo que sugiere que se ha retraído en sí misma. Se asemeja a un caparazón vacío, controlado por una mera fracción de su mente, mientras el resto de ella se oculta a tu mirada. Reparas en que la mano que tiene sobre la mesa no está totalmente quieta: su dedo traza un patrón familiar en movimientos sutiles...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When she looks at you again, her eyes are glassy, suggesting that all her thoughts are now turned inward. She resembles an empty shell, governed by a mere fraction of her mind, while the rest of it eludes your sight. You notice that her hand that is lying on the table is not completely still: her finger, with subtle twitches, is tracing a familiar pattern...{/n}

Se asemeja a un caparazón vacío, controlado por una mera fracción de su mente, mientras el resto de ella se oculta a tu mirada. Reparas en que la mano que tiene sobre la mesa no está totalmente quieta: su dedo traza un patrón familiar en movimientos sutiles...{/n}

languages.text: {n}再びあなたを見た彼女の目は虚ろで、あらゆる思考が内向きになっていることを示唆していた。彼女は空っぽの抜け殻のようだ。心のごく一部に支配されている一方で、それ以外の部分はあなたの目には映らない。テーブルの上に乗っている彼女の手が、じっとしているわけではないことに気づく。かすかに震える彼女の指は、見覚えのあるパターンを辿っている…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When she looks at you again, her eyes are glassy, suggesting that all her thoughts are now turned inward. She resembles an empty shell, governed by a mere fraction of her mind, while the rest of it eludes your sight. You notice that her hand that is lying on the table is not completely still: her finger, with subtle twitches, is tracing a familiar pattern...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}再びあなたを見た彼女の目は虚ろで、あらゆる思考が内向きになっていることを示唆していた。彼女は空っぽの抜け殻のようだ。心のごく一部に支配されている一方で、それ以外の部分はあなたの目には映らない。テーブルの上に乗っている彼女の手が、じっとしているわけではないことに気づく。かすかに震える彼女の指は、見覚えのあるパターンを辿っている…{/n}

languages.text: {n}当她再次看着你的时候，她的眼睛空洞而无神，这表明她所有注意力都转向了她的内心。她就像个空壳一样，只受一小部分意识支配，而其余的部分逃出了你的视线。你注意到，她搭在桌子上的手并不是完全静止，而是微微抽搐着，画着某种你熟悉的图案……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When she looks at you again, her eyes are glassy, suggesting that all her thoughts are now turned inward. She resembles an empty shell, governed by a mere fraction of her mind, while the rest of it eludes your sight. You notice that her hand that is lying on the table is not completely still: her finger, with subtle twitches, is tracing a familiar pattern...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当她再次看着你的时候，她的眼睛空洞而无神，这表明她所有注意力都转向了她的内心。她就像个空壳一样，只受一小部分意识支配，而其余的部分逃出了你的视线。你注意到，她搭在桌子上的手并不是完全静止，而是微微抽搐着，画着某种你熟悉的图案……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lorsqu'elle vous regarde à nouveau, ses yeux sont vitreux, comme si elle était en pleine introspection. Elle vous fait penser à une coquille vide qui ne serait gouvernée que par une fraction de son esprit tandis que le reste cherche désespérément à échapper à votre regard. Vous remarquez que sa main posée sur la table n'est pas complètement immobile : agité de subtils soubresauts, son doigt trace un motif familier...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When she looks at you again, her eyes are glassy, suggesting that all her thoughts are now turned inward. She resembles an empty shell, governed by a mere fraction of her mind, while the rest of it eludes your sight. You notice that her hand that is lying on the table is not completely still: her finger, with subtle twitches, is tracing a familiar pattern...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sana tekrar baktığında gözlerinde donuk bir bakış görüyorsun. Bu da tüm düşüncelerinin artık içe döndüğünü ortaya koyuyor. Yalnızca zihninin bir parçasının kontrol ettiği, boş bir kabuğu andırıyor. Zihninin geri kalanıysa erişemeyeceğin kadar uzaklara kaçıyor. Masaya koyduğu elinin tamamen sabit durmadığını fark ediyorsun. Hafifçe seğiren parmağı, aşina olduğun bir motif çiziyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When she looks at you again, her eyes are glassy, suggesting that all her thoughts are now turned inward.
